sentences.sentence: That dinner was lovely, a standard plate of rice, meat and spicy homemade sambal, but did not compare to that first night I ate at the market, after parking my bike among dozens of scooters.
sentences.translation: 那顿晚餐还算开心，一客标准份量的米饭、肉和辣口的自制叁巴酱，但是跟我第一天晚上将自行车停在一堆小绵羊里后在集市上吃的那顿，还是没法比。
